# HMPresenceEventType.firstEntry

**Case**

Triggers an event for the first user entering the home.

## Declaration

```swift
case firstEntry
```

## Specifying presence type

- **HMPresenceEventType.everyEntry**: Triggers the event every time a user enters the home.
- **HMPresenceEventType.everyExit**: Triggers the event every time a user leaves the home.
- **HMPresenceEventType.lastExit**: Triggers an event when the last user leaves the home.
